[[index]]

Website
-------
https://w3m.sourceforge.net


Cheat Sheet
-----------

H     | Show runtime options
K,J   | Scroll one line at a time
z     | Center current line
[,]   | Go to first/last link
TAB   | Go to next link
S+TAB | Go to previous link
C-m   | Popup link menu
C-t   | Open in new tab
a     | Save link
c     | Peek current url
u     | Peek link url
I     | View image
L     | Show all links and images
B     | Back
v     | View source
s     | Popup buffer selection
S     | Save buffer to file
E     | Edit (local file)
R     | Reload page
T     | Open new tab
C-q   | Close tab
{,}   | Next/Previous tab
ESC-t | Tab Menu
ESC-b | View bookmark
ESC-a | Add bookmark
o     | Option setting panel
C-h   | View history
q     | Quit with confirmation
Q     | Quit without confirmation
/,?   | Search forward/back
C-k   | View cookies
